Uses of Package
marytts.modules.synthesis

Packages that use marytts.modules.synthesis
marytts.datatypes   
marytts.features   
marytts.htsengine   
marytts.language.en   
marytts.modules All the modules doing the actual processing. 
marytts.modules.synthesis Internals of the synthesis module. 
marytts.server   
marytts.signalproc.effects A wrapper package for audio effects in Mary TTS.
All audio effects are derived from the BaseAudioEffect and should include appropriate parameter setting, parameter querying, help text generation, and processing functionality.

marytts.unitselection.interpolation

Classes in marytts.modules.synthesis used by marytts.datatypes
Voice
          A helper class for the synthesis module; each Voice object represents one available voice database.

WaveformSynthesizer
          Provide a common interface for all waveform synthesizers, to be called from within the "wrapping" Synthesis module.

Classes in marytts.modules.synthesis used by marytts.modules.synthesis
MBROLAPhoneme
           
Voice
          A helper class for the synthesis module; each Voice object represents one available voice database.
Voice.Gender
           
VoiceSection
          A helper class for the synthesis module, representing a section of synthesis input data to be spoken by the same voice.
VoiceSectioner
          A helper class for the synthesis module, splitting synthesis input data into sections to be spoken by the same voice.
WaveformSynthesizer
          Provide a common interface for all waveform synthesizers, to be called from within the "wrapping" Synthesis module.
